Minichamps 430818555 Ford Capri Turbo 1981 DRM Series 3rd Place K. Ludwig

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: https://minichamps.de/EN/Models/ModelDetails/430818555/index.html

Manfred Winkelhock switched from BMWs to the Zakspeed Capris for the final year of the DRM series. Winkelhock took six Division 1 wins, good for 2nd in class and 3rd overall in the DRM championship matching his finishes with BMW in 1977 & 1979.
